desc: We are a Los Angeles based online jewelry boutique. We curate classic pieces that will always stay in style and with fair pricing. Never plated, Never filled, Always real gold. Free shipping and free returns within the United States. Buy 14k gold 10k gold, an sterling silver earrings, chains, necklaces, and bangles.

layout.text: We are on vacation on and off till the middle of July. Shop goes live on listed date above^^^
